recipe.title: Baked Trout with Shiitake Mushrooms, Tomatoes, and Ginger
ingredients: 2 whole rainbow trout (about 12 ounces each), cleaned, boned, butterflied
2 large fresh shiitake mushrooms, stemmed, caps thinly sliced
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Line large rimmed baking sheet with foil; coat with nonstick spray. Sprinkle fish with salt and pepper. Open fish like a book and arrange, skin side down, on prepared baking sheet. Mix next 5 ingredients in bowl. Sprinkle mixture over fish, drizzle with soy sauce and sesame oil, then top with cilantro sprigs. Bake uncovered until fish is opaque in center, about 20 minutes.
